QuestData.Title: Elegant Design
QuestData.Description: Amateur merchants complain about supply and demand. Masters create their own.$b$bYou have done well retrieving the last two pieces I requested, but they are baubles compared to this.$b$bYour target is the Lady Anastae, and she has something very valuable of mine: A design for a masterwork gem cut. $b$bGo and get it from her by any means necessary, but take care. She is a master manipulator and will tell you all manner of lies.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Convince Lady Anastae to give you the Gemcutter's Tome.
QuestData.LogDescription: Convince Lady Anastae to give you the Gemcutter's Tome.
QuestData.RewardText: Lespin shall pay for his crimes!
